data.text: One day after training――
data.processed: <story>One day after training――

data.text:
Good work, Trainer-san. I found a 
delicious tea, so I'll prepare it now.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Good work, Trainer-san. I found a 
<story>delicious tea, so I'll prepare it now.

data.text:
Even if it was to recover fatigue from the previous race, 
the training felt so light that it was a little unsatisfying～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Even if it was to recover fatigue from the previous race, 
<story>the training felt so light that it was a little unsatisfying～.

data.text: Today, again, it ended before the sun had set……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Today, again, it ended before the sun had set……

data.text:
Fufuu, of course, I understand. So that I can 
win the next race, I need to properly rest…… right?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, of course, I understand. So that I can 
<story>win the next race, I need to properly rest…… right?

data.text:
『It'll be too late once something happens』―― 
Trainer-san, I'm always grateful for your consideration♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>『It'll be too late once something happens』―― 
<story>Trainer-san, I'm always grateful for your consideration♪

data.text: (Ding dong ding……)
data.processed: <story>(Ding dong ding……)

data.text:
『Grass Wonder-san, the Student Council President is calling you. 
Please make your way to the student council room』
data.name: School Broadcast
data.processed:
<story>『Grass Wonder-san, the Student Council President is calling you. 
<story>Please make your way to the student council room』

data.text: Oh, what could that possibly be about……?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Oh, what could that possibly be about……?

data.text: Trainer-san, I have returned～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, I have returned～.

data.text:
It seems that they wanted to request that I participate in the 
mock race they're holding at the school's orientation.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>It seems that they wanted to request that I participate in the 
<story>mock race they're holding at the school's orientation.

data.text:
For all those girls who dream of the Twinkle Series, 
to think they'd be watching me race, it's quite the honor♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>For all those girls who dream of the Twinkle Series, 
<story>to think they'd be watching me race, it's quite the honor♪

data.text:
Then we should get to training…… Oh, Trainer-san, 
you've been staring at me for a while, is something wrong?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: Don't push yourself too hard, ok?
Don't push yourself too hard, ok?

data.processed:
<story>Then we should get to training…… Oh, Trainer-san, 
<story>you've been staring at me for a while, is something wrong?

data.text:
Oh, that's right. 
I was so happy to be selected, that I couldn't help it.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, that's right. 
<story>I was so happy to be selected, that I couldn't help it.

data.text: Well then, I'll adjust my running, a little bit, accordingly.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Well then, I'll adjust my running, a little bit, accordingly.

data.text:
Trainer-san, it's fine if you head home first. 
There's no issue if I do the adjustments on my own～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, it's fine if you head home first. 
<story>There's no issue if I do the adjustments on my own～

data.text:
『A little bit』 is what Grass Wonder said but, she had originally 
refused scouts until she was satisfied with her own results.
data.processed:
<story>『A little bit』 is what Grass Wonder said but, she had originally 
<story>refused scouts until she was satisfied with her own results.

data.text:
Even if it was just a mock race, if she herself 
wanted to win, then she'd probably go too far…… 
thinking that, I went to check on her――
data.processed:
<story>Even if it was just a mock race, if she herself 
<story>wanted to win, then she'd probably go too far…… 
<story>thinking that, I went to check on her――

data.text: Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… Haa……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… Haa……

data.text:
Huu…… 3 more laps…… 
But with a faster time……!
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Huu…… 3 more laps…… 
<story>But with a faster time……!

data.text:
As I predicted, she was doing the same amount of 
training she would normally do before a race.
data.processed:
<story>As I predicted, she was doing the same amount of 
<story>training she would normally do before a race.

data.text:
I know how strong her desire for victory is. At the very least, 
I would make sure she didn't push herself too hard. And then――
data.processed:
<story>I know how strong her desire for victory is. At the very least, 
<story>I would make sure she didn't push herself too hard. And then――

data.text:
So fast!! 
Grass Wonder drives in on the straight!!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>So fast!! 
<story>Grass Wonder drives in on the straight!!

data.text:
And just like that she stays in front! 
First place is Grass Wonder!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>And just like that she stays in front! 
<story>First place is Grass Wonder!

data.text:
It was an overwhelming victory for Grass Wonder. 
And after that, the younger girls started gathering around her.
data.processed:
<story>It was an overwhelming victory for Grass Wonder. 
<story>And after that, the younger girls started gathering around her.

data.text: Onee～chan, you're so strooo～ng!
data.name: Uma Musume Girl A
data.processed: <story>Onee～chan, you're so strooo～ng!

data.text:
Onee～chan looks so kind, 
but she's almost like a "monster"～! Amaaaaazing～!
data.name: Uma Musume Girl B
data.processed:
<story>Onee～chan looks so kind, 
<story>but she's almost like a "monster"～! Amaaaaazing～!

data.text: Fufuu, a "monster", is it? I'm honored♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, a "monster", is it? I'm honored♪

data.text:
Oh, Trainer-san. 
Is there something on my face?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, Trainer-san. 
<story>Is there something on my face?

data.text:
I'll cheer for you in the Twinkle Series too, so win! 
Monster Onee～chan!
data.name: Uma Musume Girl A
data.processed:
<story>I'll cheer for you in the Twinkle Series too, so win! 
<story>Monster Onee～chan!

data.text:
Yeah, I'll definitely win～. 
Once you grow up, you can run together with Onee-chan too.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I'll definitely win～. 
<story>Once you grow up, you can run together with Onee-chan too.

data.text:
Grass Wonder's desire to win was unfathomable. 
It was a mock race that reaffirmed how I needed to support her.
data.processed:
<story>Grass Wonder's desire to win was unfathomable. 
<story>It was a mock race that reaffirmed how I needed to support her.
